author: fimi.vn
title: CardanoTalk for Vietnamese
description: Cardano users in Vietnam are looking forward to more talk shows so they can stay up to date with the news and get their questions answered about Cardano.

author: lamvoi2022
title: Tre Viet - VN support channel
description: Cardano Vietnam community needs a trust worthy place to discuss, update, look up and analyze information about all projects on the Cardano, and provide technical support in time.

author: mie.tran.0407
title: Cardano Catalyst TV
description: Voters do not have time to read and comprehend the insights of all proposals worth voting on, and proposers lack the credibility and reputability to reach voters as well as marketing means

author: npaquoc87
title: Cardano Incredible Race 2022
description: Cardano Community in Vietnam is lacking of social events. We need to make Cardano community more visible and create impact to new people.

author: nguyenthiha07tp1
title: Service Marketplace for Japan, VN
description: Lacking a place to gather skilled people able to supply support services for unskilled proposers and PAs with a reasonable cost, especially, in non-English speaking communities like Japan and Vietnam.

author: longka
title: Haskell for beginners in Vietnamese
description: Haskell is freaking hard to learn! And even harder for beginner in Vietnam to feel it.

author: calexander
title: East Asia Artistic Grant Proposal
description: Financial security for East Asian artists can be incredibly challenging, especially at the beginning of their career and often they lack material and technical support to pursue their artistic goals

author: cardanochina
title: China Info Hub Continued
description:
The Cardano community leans heavily toward North America and Europe. Growth in Asia needs support from the community.
Continue the work of educating the Chinese speakers globally since F4 and F7.

author: cryptoloops
title: CNFT Alliance: Japanese Community!
description: There is a need to raise awareness of and provide accessibility to CNFT projects in East Asia. Therefore, it is paramount that language does not deter people from being involved within NFT projects.

title: CNFT Alliance: Chinese Community!
description: There is a need to raise awareness of and provide accessibility to CNFT projects in East Asia. Therefore, it is paramount that language does not deter people from being involved within NFT projects.

title: CNFT Alliance: Vietnamese Community
description: There is a need to raise awareness of and provide accessibility to CNFT projects in East Asia. Therefore, it is paramount that language does not deter people from being involved within NFT projects.

author: cryptoloops
title: Flooftopia: Chinese Translation
description: Currently, there is a need to raise awareness & provide accessibility to CNFT gaming projects in East Asia. As the interest continues to grow, is paramount that we remove any language barriers.

author: cryptoloops
title: Flooftopia: Japanese Translation
description: Currently, there is a need to raise awareness & provide accessibility to CNFT gaming projects in East Asia. As the interest continues to grow, is paramount that we remove any language barriers.

author: ericphan2510
title: HealthFI X Cardano - Move to Plant
description: Forest cover in Vietnam is decreasing yearly, climate change is becoming more extreme, and environmental protection events are still ineffective in raising awareness due to a lack of transparency.

author: easterntownhall
title: Eastern Town Hall Team Operation
description: Participating in Catalyst is difficult when you live in the Eastern Hemisphere Time zones where English is not the main language.

author: easterntownhall
title: Connecting Asian Voter and Proposer
description: Language barriers and cultural differences creates a lack of trust on sources to rely on before and during the voting period.

author: lionmode
title: Cardano Bridges in Japanese
description: Japan has a large Cardano community, but the major Cardano bridges do not yet have any Japanese localization. This limits the Japan community's ability to access these parts of the ecosystem.

author: easterntownhall
title: Onboarding East Asia Today
description: Despite a population of billions, East Asia is underrepresented in Catalyst due to a lack of localized content and Town Hall participation.

author: dimitri777
title: Cardano in Tamil
description: Lack of official Tamil content . Thus Tamil speakers cannot learn in their native language. There are 75 million speakers around the world.

author: lionmode
title: Japanese support for wallets
description: The major lightweight wallets for Cardano are missing Japanese language support

author: vcoincheck
title: Vcoincheck Library (Phase 2)
description:
Knowledge and news about Cardano are mostly in English,it is difficult to reach Japanese community, affecting the expansion of Cardano...
Knowledge about Cardano and blockchain are very large

author: andretuwan
title: YouTube educational video in Bahasa
description: Cardano have great potential and need promotion to bring more mass adoption at Indonesia, where people already aware about blockchain but lack of awareness on Cardano and it's Ecosystem.

author: kosshop1618
title: 2 minutes Crypto Dict for Japanese
description: Nowadays, Pepeole're too busy to read hard-to-understand technical like blockchain & Cardano. These knowledge are very fragmented & mainly written in English so difficult for Japanese to access.

author: raz
title: ArtSuite Cardano Course Bangladesh
description: Cardano is not very well known in Bangladesh despite a rising population of 165m people and 19.5m people in the capital city Dhaka, the 9th most populated city in the world.

author: cerpofficial
title: Cardano ERP - Grow Asia
description: Cardano needs more developers from Asia participating in Emurgo Academy training and developing enterprise-grade products on the Cardano blockchain.

author: yunya
title: CNFT Community in Asian Community
description: The non-English speaking community has difficulty gathering information about CNFT, which is attracting a lot of interest. 日本語

author: eagle
title: It is not straight forward for non-
description: It is not straight forward for non-English speaking users to onboard into the Cardano ecosystem.

author: saonkoliver
title: Promoting Cardano in the highland
description: The highland children do not have the concept of coin investment or blockchain career, bringing this concept to them helps them have ambitions to develop themselves and the community where they live.

author: nvhieu
title: Catalyst Events 4 Vietnam Students
description: Many Vietnam University students are unaware of Project Catalyst's funding campaigns and the opportunities which are existing.

author: gorgasiagian1
title: Web ADA Info Community In Bahasa
description: How do Indonesians and the Cardano community find reliable and contributing Cardano information on the web?

author: kocangi27
title: Catalyst for Student in Vietnam
description: In Vietnam, the tendency of students to learn about blockchain and cryptocurrencies is increasing. However, Cardano generally and Catalyst, in particular, are still new and unknown to many students.

author: marcus.puchalla
title: Translate Eternl
description: Without support for Asian languages in Eternl, we exclude ~1.45b non-English speakers from the Cardano system. While Asia accounts for 52% of global growth in tech-company revenues in the last decade.

author: hungbui205197
title: Catalyst for Student in Vietnam
description: Blockchain application for buying and selling sports tickets

author: saqib
title: Reskilling and Rewarding Refugees
description: Rohingya and other refugees lack formal education and financial access in Malaysia, leading to social exclusion.

author: tadatek
title: Cardano Guide - A one-stop guide
description: Confused about where to begin with Cardano? This proposal provides a one-stop guide for those new to Cardano World.

author: paulbriskchainsmart
title: Blockchain for Contracts: Indonesia
description: Today original legal contracts are stored in physical safes at notary offices which represent a single point of failure. Contract process is paper based and manual. Hard to keep track of contracts.

author: vutuananh101190
title: Catalyst For Full-Time Speculators
description: A lot of speculators and freelancers they have a lot of time, but they don't know about Catalyst's Funding campaign and huge opportunities in technology platforms.

author: nhirayama
title: Quality Assurance of Organic Foods
description: Japan uses the most pesticides in the world, but these chemicals are used to increase the profits of the petrochemical industry. And the health hazards of these chemicals have not been disclosed.

author: win
title: AI Blockchain Activity DApp 🚀
description:
Activity, mobility & transportation companies are disconnected.
Services are becoming more expensive, complicated, inefficient, unsafe.
Negative impact on environment.
Safety and security concerns.

author: dimitri777
title: Cardano in Sinhala
description: Lack of official Sinhala content . Thus Sinhala speakers cannot learn in their native language. There are 25 million speakers globally

author: singular
title: Singular- Mobile-Centric DeFi App
description: Singular’s mission is to democratize DeFi and First-Class financial tools for the underbanked in Asia. We believe anyone with a smartphone should have access to invest and participate in a Web3 world

author: quintin
title: Onboarding Musicians From Asia
description: There is a major absence of users from East Asia on Cardano in the music community.

author: ceviteam
title: CEVI - INFO HUB FOR VN (EN)
description: Continue to develop an information hub CEVI to provide basic knowledge,update and analyze information about Crypto in general,especially focusing on the Cardano platform for the Vietnamese community.

author: sonny.dhamayana
title: Trust & Transparent News Portal
description: The main challenges come up and most facing by growth and development country are trust and transparent journalism information which free from propaganda, hatespeech, false information, etc.

author: haedu
title: Raise Vietnam awareness on Cardano
description: Just 6.1% of Vietnam’s population know about blockchain & Cardano. 94% left don’t understand, misunderstand, even averse because of being scammed. There's not many public events on the issues.

author: dimitri777
title: Cardano in Burmese
description: Lack of official Burmese content . Thus Burmese speakers cannot learn in their native language. There are 51 million speakers globally

author: cardano4climate
title: Cardano4Climate East Asia
description: While climate change is an increasing risk for East Asia today there is no specific community platform supporting initiatives to promote climate resilience into everyday activities

author: raz
title: Cardojo: Cardano in Asia
description: Asia has some of the highest NFT adoption rates in the world: Philippines, Thailand and Malaysia are the top 3, yet Cardano’s presence and exposure to Cardano NFTS is largely disproportionate.

author: raz
title: Asia Stakepool Alliance
description: Asia has +50% of the global population + the most populated cities globally. A Stakepool Alliance to support single SPOs in Asia to promote greater decentralization of the Cardano network is lacking.

author: mie.tran.0407
title: Cardano Catalyst TV - Ideas Sharing
description: New and funded proposals have no source or platform to communicate with the community properly if they have new ideas or would like to update their proposals' progress for the community

author: tanakafj
title: Cardano Japan Brand Dev Initiative
description:
Need to develop more materials (fact sheets, bios, project intros, case studies, etc.) for media in Japan.
Opportunities to expand to an influencer management program with industry, gov't leaders etc

author: vct
title: Blockchain Knowledge Videos
description: There are very few videos about blockchain technology knowledge in Vietnamese. This makes a lot of investors in Vietnam not really understand the technology of blockchain and Cardano.

author: elraulito
title: CNFTacademy translation
description: It is not easy to find good Japanese and Chinese dev courses for Cardano developers

author: xuanle.752020
title: Crypto Tik Tok Channel for Youth
description: Knowledge about Blockchain and Crypto is quite novel and confusing for young people. Build a TikTok channel to help them to easily access and participate in both Blockchain, Crypto as well as Cardano.

author: cardanoprojects.org
title: Educational Hub by CardanoProjects
description: Currently, KOLs on social networks still call Cardano a Ghost Chain. We want to build a portal on CardanoProjects.org to educate users in a mainstream way about the Cardano ecosystem.

author: cardanoprojects.org
title: Event Calendar on CardanoProjects
description: The Cardano ecosystem attracts many developers to build the project, but users do not know the NFT mint schedule, public sale, ISPO ... when to start.

author: diarpii
title: Lotus Link: Eco-Farm Traceability
description: Village communities in Vietnam need infrastructure for sales of local goods—especially in agricultural & heritage-tourism contexts. Authenticity should be provable for eco-products & artisanal crafts.

author: jeffghome2020
title: Cardano Outreach - China Focus
description: Our funded project needs to hire local Chinese speaking developers to promote our educational program to Chinese university and college students.

author: jtrube
title: Local Japanese Government Strategy
description: Local governments in Japan are looking for new and innovative ways to revitalize depopulated areas and serve their aging communities. Cardano and blockchain tech are rarely considered as solutions.

author: kosshop1618
title: 2min English-Vietnamese Crypto Dict
description: Nowadays, Pepeole're too busy to read hard-to-understand technical like blockchain & Cardano. These knowledge are very fragmented & mainly written in English so difficult for Japanese to access.

author: jtrube
title: Promoting Japanese Content Abroad
description: Cool things are happening in the Japanese Cardano Community everyday - but many western audiences are unaware. English coverage of Cardano in Japan tends to favor speculation over community activity.

author: silvia.ecclesia
title: Cardano for Asia - impact ventures
description: Cardano can greatly benefit impact entrepreneurs in Asia but there is not much awareness on it and entrepreneurs would need to learn about the potential of blockchain and the Cardano network.

author: bd
title: Cardano pre-hub in Philippines
description: Cardano lacks strong representation in the Philippines while Goodwall has a strong community in the region.

author: huongdang186
title: Elevate Social Impacts via Cardano
description: There are over 20,000 social enterprises in Vietnam yet start-up social enterprises don't have much financial support to execute their work while Ada holders have lack of trusted platforms to donate.

author: jtrube
title: Educating Local Japanese Government
description: Local governments in Japan are looking for new and innovative ways to revitalize depopulated areas and serve their aging communities. Cardano and blockchain tech are rarely considered as solutions.

author: dimitri777
title: Cardano in Laotian
description: Provide translated content taken from official Cardano documentation in the form of Laotianvideos about Cardano ecosystem.

author: dimitri777
title: Cardano in Khmer
description: Provide translated content taken from official Cardano documentation in the form of Khmer videos about Cardano ecosystem.

author: kidpool
title: Cardano Asia TikTok Channel
description: The rapidly increasing Asia community requires that Cardano documents and news be presented in a more reliable, understandable, and effective way in local Asian languages.

author: jtrube
title: Amplify Japanese Cardano Content
description: Cool things are happening for Cardano in Japan everyday - but reaching audiences outside of the existing community is difficult. Media coverage in general tends to favor speculation over innovation.

author: jtrube
title: Maximize Value From Previous Funds
description: There is more value that could be extracted from the content we are creating from previous funds. With additional time and resources, content could be built upon and shared with a wider audience.
